TopicTitle: [1.1.2]Kerbal Stock Launcher Overhaul (6/6/16 More parts and improvements)

Articles.Content:
I noticed that this requires the smokescreen plugin that HotRockets uses, but it is not included in the download or mentioned in the first post.

Thank you, should be fixed now.

How do you attach the conic fairing, I'm struggling.

What fairing might you be referring to?
The atlas looking one

Alright, found a bug. The Procedural Fairings payload base and the normal fairings Payload Base have the same name (not title). This causes all sorts of weirdness. It can be fixed by changing

name=PayloadDec

to

PayloadDecProc

on the procedural fairings version.

*Scratches head*

I'm getting rusty in keeping up with my threads. I believe I have uploaded a fix for that already from a long time ago. Any issues? @_@

(I just had to click this thread to know if I already replied to issues, I forgot)
Current download still has the part name issue.

yup, the fairing decouplers still using the same name.

also, i think you left some dev parts in the package as well, the Atlas-ish fairing doesnt fit anywhere lol.
Does this mod REQUIRE hot rockets, or just the smokescreen plugin?
Just smokescreen. It's included in the download.

Ah, the one that I fixed is the smokescreen, I already added it I remember. I'll upload a fix at once, the atlas fairings aren't included. lol. Like I said, it's an experimental release, I just quickly released it at June 13
Done, not in dropbox though because my uploading there is borked.
Heads up: Texture switcher is NOT functioning in 0.24 with the latest version of Firespitter installed.
Thanks, I gotta update this as well.
Just the Firespitter dependencies. Otherwise, it's running quite well.
What was firespitter needed for in this pack? I'm playing .24 stock for a good while, but I'd like to spice it up a bit.

What was firespitter needed for in this pack? I'm playing .24 stock for a good while, but I'd like to spice it up a bit.

A proto 0.23.5 Firespitter ._. Maybe I should release one that just fixes that first?
The firespitter.dll currently available for 0.24 seems to allow the texture swapping in KSLO to work perfectly fine on 32bit at least, haven't tried 64bit.

Do what you gotta do blackheart. I was just curious as to what the Firespitter.dll was used for. And wether or not the textures worked. But Kaput says it works fine so I'll give it a go. Hopefully all is well in x64

I was thinking of postponing all my mods with models and remodeling. Because I was crazy enough and did something this morning, I was playing around KW and thought what if I remodeled and redesigned mine that looks like it but bears stockalike textures? Hmmmm....

(No alpha, no bumps and texture not done yet at this point)

(Y)

looks good!
I think it really looks good indeed
Not sure if this looks better than previous KR-1 or not. Also not sure if I am successful in making a cute fat rocket based on Mainsail.
the yellow part around the nozzle looks out of place, well actually it looks like its floating. lol
Maybe I should just change the tanks. LOL
Is this mod still alive?

Not sure if this looks better than previous KR-1 or not. Also not sure if I am successful in making a cute fat rocket based on Mainsail.

http://i.imgur.com/lBQbEPO.png

I think the original KR-1 looked better. By the way, will you upload the fixes for the exhaust effects anytime soon? The mid-power 2.5m engine looks really weird without any exhaust.
